meanings.definition: Cleanse (a body part) with a stream of water or other liquid.
meanings.sent1: She was douching her face with cool water.
meanings.sent2: After gardening, she douches her hands to remove the dirt.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he was douching his feet to make them dance-ready.
meanings.sent4: The rain was douching the leaves, giving them a fresh shine.
meanings.sent5: The chef was douching the vegetables to ensure they were clean for cooking.

meanings.definition: Rinse or wash (a body part) with a stream of water or other liquid.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys douching her hair with herbal shampoo.
meanings.sent2: The athlete douches his body with cold water after a workout.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to be douching its paws in the puddle playfully.
meanings.sent4: The waves were douching the shore with foamy water.
meanings.sent5: The gardener was douching the plants gently to keep them hydrated.

meanings.definition: The act of cleansing a body part with a stream of water or other liquid.
meanings.sent1: Her daily douching routine includes using warm water.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended a specific solution for vaginal douching.
meanings.sent3: The spa offered a luxurious douching service for relaxation.
